Configuration.Name: L1=L2=4_central_apx10
Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.064 config.det = 3200 config.det_offset = 300 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g5' config.apx = -72 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 92.39 config.beamcenterz = 95.06 config.drive()
